text:
@RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump China has a much larger population, yet America has so many more covid-19 infected people (most worldwide), the # of those who died will likely increase to be the most.
Isn't that a bit baffling? What went wrong internally? there are some easy answers & they start with Trump.
